sbl_utils_tda3xx.h File Reference
TDA3xx SBL Utilities

This file contains the SBL Utility layer specific to TDA3xx platform. This also contains some related macros, structures and enums. More...

#include <ti/csl/csl_crc.h>

Detailed Description

This file contains the SBL Utility layer specific to TDA3xx platform. This also contains some related macros, structures and enums.
